Text:
thanks for the upload effort, but the video quality is a bit of a joke. i looked at the size before i downloaded and figured it would look bad if you're putting a whole 720p movie in less than 700 MB.

what's the point of 720p if the bitrate is this low? i've got VHS tapes that look better.

...when i check the video stream parameters it's not even a 720p rip!! this is 640x304 using DIVX 3!!! DIVX 3!!!! what is this, 2002?

false advertising. downloaders beware.
